Song.title: See, He Comes
Song.copyright: © 2012 Sovereign Grace Worship Words by John Cennick & Charles Wesley Music & additional words by Rich Gunderlock & Zach Sprowls

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C | D | Em | G]
V. 1: See, He [Em]comes u[D]pon the [C]clouds, Jesus [G]Christ, our [C/G]King ap[G]pears All the [Em]saints bought [D]by His [C]blood{,} will rise to [G]meet Him [D]in the [G]air Earth and [Em]sea shall [D/F#]flee a[C]way, all cre[G/D]ation waits and [Bm7]groans For the [Em]Lord Re[D/F#]deemer [C]comes{,} to take His [Am7]longing exiles [Bm7]home
CH: Halle[Cmaj7]lujah, halle[Em7]lujah,{,} come, O [C]Lord, on earth to [G]reign Halle[Cmaj7]lujah, halle[Em7]lujah, we a[C]wait the coming [Em (intro)]day
V. 2: Those who [Em]mocked and [D]scorned His [C]name Pierced and [G]nailed Him [C/G]to the [G]tree Deeply [Em]wail, in [D]sorrow [C]grieve{,} when they the [G]true Mes[D]siah [G]see Every [Em]eye will [D/F#]see the [C]Lord{,} dressed in [G/D]dreadful majest[Bm7]y Every [Em]knee shall [D/F#]bow be[C]fore{,} the Judge of [Am7]all eterni[Bm7]ty
V. 3: Still He [Em]bears the [D]holy [C]scars, evi[G]dence of [C/G]saving [G]grace All the [Em]saints bought [D]by His [C]blood{,} shall then re[G]joice to [D]see His [G]face Yes, a[Em]men, let [D/F#]all [ ]a[C]dore{,} Christ on [G/D]His eternal [Bm7]throne All the [Em]pow’r and [D/F#]might are [C]Yours Come, claim the [Am7]kingdom as Your [Bm7]own
Arrangement.searchtext: intro v 1 see he comes upon the clouds jesus christ our king appears all the saints bought by his blood will rise to meet him in the air earth and sea shall flee away all creation waits and groans for the lord redeemer comes to take his longing exiles home ch hallelujah hallelujah come o lord on earth to reign hallelujah hallelujah we await the coming day v 2 those who mocked and scorned his name pierced and nailed him to the tree deeply wail in sorrow grieve when they the true messiah see every eye will see the lord dressed in dreadful majesty every knee shall bow before the judge of all eternity v 3 still he bears the holy scars evidence of saving grace all the saints bought by his blood shall then rejoice to see his face yes amen let all adore christ on his eternal throne all the powr and might are yours come claim the kingdom as your own
